name: Mansfield Valley Motor Inn

reviews.text: We have stayed at this Motel twice now. Rooms are clean but basic. But thats all we wanted so I would happily recommend to anyone wanting clean accommodation close into Town to try this Motel. Nice outlook onto the swimming pool area. Two doors, one for parking the car and the other to overlook the pool and gardens. Nice touch. Quiet even though it is on the main road. We love Mansfield and all it has to offer.
reviews.title: Nice and close into Town

reviews.text: We come up to do the bush markets and find it very convenient, just down the end of the street,
reviews.title: Great little motel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is one of the best country motels I've stayed in. If you're travelling through Mansfield and need a place to stay, stay here. The motor inn is not new, but it is clean, very neat and tidy. The shower is large, which I love, and the hot water is wonderful. There is a front door and a back door to your room, so you park at the back, unload your car, and you can go to the pool area through the front door. very pleasant. The pool is nicely shaded and private from the street. There is a BBQ, but with all the great cafes nearby in town, why bother? The motor inn is only 5 min walk from town. Toaster and kettle in the room, and a small sink in the room, all clean. The owner is very nice and friendly. Overall, a very pleasant place to hang your hat for a couple days or just driving through. Definitely will be back... Especially for the ski season.
reviews.title: Very comfortable, relaxing quiet stay

reviews.text: After touring Victoria for a week we had a night here and found it to be the best motel we had stayed in. Kitchenette was very useful, comfortable bed, very clean and attractively decorated and set out room. So nice to have good quality, soft towels after what we had experienced elsewhere. The owners were very helpful and happy to help with information about the district. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Enjoyable Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pleasant staff that didn't seem to have a great deal of knowledge about the area but they were only caretakers. Room was clean and tidy. They did not seem overly keen to have our breakfast ready at the requested 7am, but they did and it was of acceptable quality.
reviews.title: Excellent location and quality room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You have to drive into this motel property to appreciate the garden setting.
reviews.title: What apicturesque motel property - very peaceful

reviews.text: Yes, what a picturesque motel, we enjoyed pre-dinner drinks outside on the verandah over looking the shady garden. Very peaceful and just a short walk out for dinner to the local hotel.
reviews.title: Just average...

reviews.text: We enjoyed our stay at the Mansfield Valley Motor Inn. Staff very pleasant and obliging.A quiet enviorment with swimming pool and garden area. Just a pleas walk into town where there are plenty of eating optionsant. Rooms very clean and well appointed.
reviews.title: Enjoyable stopover

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have stayed a few times over the last 20 years. Great town excellent hub for the Victorian alps. Perfectly adequate little motel. Position is just ok,right on the highway, and the rooms are dated and have seen better days, but that is part of the appeal of Australian rural motor inns, and certainly the service here is excellent. Run by a very nice couple who bend over backwards to help
reviews.title: Great Place to Stop

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.text: Drove into Mansfield and booked into Mansfield Motor Inn, great place to stay, ordered breakfast which was delivered to the room via this nifty little breakfast cupboard, BEST BREAKFAST I have had at a motel, great value for money also.
reviews.title: wonderful prelude to Mount Buller

reviews.text: We stayed for a ski weekend...nice size rooms. Quiet location.. Good pressure in shower and plenty of hot water.. Kitchenette was nice... Owners nice and friendly..
reviews.title: Great location, great value, nice rooms

reviews.text: It was a good choice of a motel in this small country Victoria town. The room was spacious and clean; the TV was somewhat smallish, but I wasn't there to watch TV. The hotel was a place where it is pleasant to stay over night.
reviews.title: Good choice

reviews.text: Had a golf weekend with 11 friends, Jill and Michael (proprietors) organised the lot, we just had to move in and play. Rooms are beautifuly presented and surrounding grounds and pool just lovely to sit around after a day of golf. The breakfast has to be seen to believe plenty of every thing and no problems if your after seconds. A great weekend made all the better by our hosts. We will be back.
reviews.title: A great motel

reviews.text: Upon finding Mansfield Valley Mortor Inn on a website, we decided to inspect. Pleasantly surprised to find over the counter price matched the discount website price. The room was large, modern and immaculatly clean. The bathroom was modern and well kitted. I was pleased to discover a small sink in the kitchenette. Staying on a friday night - it was lovely and quiet - no road noise to disturb us in the extreamly comfortable bed.
reviews.title: Very nice motel

aka: Mansfield Valley Motor Inn Victoria, Australia
description: Mansfield Valley Motor Inn is situated in the main street of Mansfield walking distance to the hotels, cafes, restuarants and shops.We offer affordable motel accommodation in a peaceful garden environment, all our motel rooms have an outdoor setting outside the rooms where your can relax and enjoy your stay. There is ample parking which is at the back door to units, room service breakfast is available and rooms are stocked with mini bars.To help you enjoy you stay in Mansfield we offer you a salt water swimming pool, BBQ facilities, tennis courts and we also have a guest laundry.The motel is adjacent to the High Country Rail Trail, Mullum wetlands and the Mansfield Visitor Information Centre.
